alert.note: Alert for Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 07 at 3:47AM EDT until September 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat indices in the mid-90s expected. * WHERE...In Maine, Interior Cumberland Highlands and Southern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Carroll County. * WHEN...From Noon today to 6 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Overnight low temperatures will only fall into the upper 60s to near 70 degrees, offering little relief.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates as this has potential to persist through Friday.
